articles.title: Oppo A18 With 6.56-Inch HD+ Display and 5,000mAh Battery Launched: Specifications - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Oppo A18 launched in the UAE on Thursday. The Oppo A18 comes with a MediaTek Helio G85 SoC, 5,000mAh battery, and a 6.56-inch HD+ display. The smartphone shares similar specifications to the Oppo A38, which was unveiled earlier this month and is available in …
articles.content: Oppo A18 was launched in the UAE on Thursday. The smartphone shares similar specifications to the Oppo A38, which was unveiled earlier this month and is now available in the UAE and also in India. Th… [+1714 chars]
